Hello, I am David

I like to build stuff and learn new things

About me

I am currently working as a frontend developer for xapling for more than 3 years now. In those years I worked across multiple projects from creating and maintaining a Angular component-library to developing a brand-new CRUD-program to manage employees.


Outside of work I love to run and cycle, learn new things in all areas and tinker with all kinds of electronis, always beeing watched by my two cats.
